key_risks: Raw Material Volatility: Exposure to fluctuations in petrochemical derivative prices impacting margins.
Environmental and Regulatory Challenges: Compliance with stringent environmental regulations increasing operational costs.
Supply Chain Disruptions: Global supply chain challenges affecting operations and delivery timelines.
Competitive Pressure: High competition in the adhesives industry requiring continuous innovation.
controversies: Environmental Impact: Scrutiny over emissions, waste management, and use of hazardous materials.
Financial Performance: Downward revision of fiscal 2024 guidance due to delayed orders and weak demand.
environmental_issues: Emissions and Waste Management: Compliance with environmental regulations and reduction of greenhouse gas emissions.
social_issues: Ethical Sourcing and Labor Practices: Commitment to ethical business practices and human rights standards.
governance_issues: Regulatory Compliance: Increasing costs associated with compliance to environmental and safety regulations.
